Tankor: Rhinox info in this post

I've had a couple false starts and would like to have a clear entry point
for my group.  The core Pasificus Maximal group is just hanging around their
base, I'm presuming that in the time I've been away that they've made
repairs and the base is fully operational.

Airly and I were doing stuff with the Bushido Predecons a few years ago,
they're in the city very close to the Valley Mine Pentetron.  I think that's
all in what would be modern-day Russia.

Rhinox is at that base, he was watching Celeron do experements, but Celeron
has since left to investegate the tsunami.  Airly controls Kratos who is
Predcon commander there and she was covering Rhinox for a few months after
Tankor left.

There was also a vampiric predecon around the base.  I'm not sure what
happened to her or where she ended up, I think it was Robert's character.

I have a pretty strong predecon with a few screws loose named Trelos.  He's
a transmetal wild dog (possibly suffering from rabies) and relatively
large.  He's loyal to Hydras but tends to attack his allies.  Last seen
outside Hydras' fortress.

Anyway, could I get a synopsis of the predecon valley-mine plot, I'd like to
join that, perhaps from several angles.  Ill try to read up tomorrow on my
day off.

On Sep 20, 2010 9:26 AM, "Preston Carroll" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:



To those who are re-entering the game, just let me know what you need from
me to make your entry as smooth as possible. I am trying to create openings
to let you take over your characters, although some of them may have just
been inactive so you can probrably start them most anywhere.

However I can help, please don't hesitate to let me know.

Preston

On Sat, Sep 18, 2010 at 8:37 PM, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...>
wrote:
>
